data.title: Bedford School
data.meta_description: We look forward to welcoming you and your family to Bedford Prep School for our open morning on Saturday 30 September 2023. Meet the boys and their teachers and explore […]
data.text:
We look forward to welcoming you and your family to Bedford Prep School for our open morning on Saturday 5 October 2024. Meet the boys and their teachers and explore the many benefits of starting an independent education early.

We invite you and your son to explore the extensive facilities the boys enjoy across the Prep School and beyond, from our new outdoor classroom to our dedicated school for boys in Y3 and Y4, from our science labs and DT workshops to our art rooms, from the Erskine May Hall to our climbing wall, and much more.

The Prep School Open Morning commences at 9.00am (with registration from 8.45am) and provides the opportunity to hear from our Prep Headmaster, Ian Silk, and meet with senior members of staff, classroom teachers and our Admissions Team.

Please complete the form below to book your family’s place.

In submitting your personal data via this form, you consent to being contacted via the details provided so that your enquiry can be responded to. A backup of your data will be held, but only authorised individuals will be able to access your data. If you would like your data to be removed, please email support@thewebkitchen.co.uk.

I agree

Admissions

For full details on how to join Bedford Prep School, please visit our admissions pages.

Admissions pages

Our Admissions Team is also happy to have an informal conversation or answer any queries you may have.

If you are unable to make our open morning, we invite you to book a personal visit for your family. Please email our Admissions Team at admissions@bedfordschool.org.uk to book.
